verbs.description: President Trump [V: has] tried to discredit the Mueller investigation into his campaign 's links to Russia , fanning the flames with inaccurate information .
[ARG0: President Trump] has [V: tried] [ARG1: to discredit the Mueller investigation into his campaign 's links to Russia] , [ARGM-ADV: fanning the flames with inaccurate information] .
[ARG0: President Trump] has tried to [V: discredit] [ARG1: the Mueller investigation into his campaign 's links to Russia] , fanning the flames with inaccurate information .
[ARG0: President Trump] has tried to discredit the Mueller investigation into his campaign 's links to Russia , [V: fanning] [ARG1: the flames] [ARGM-MNR: with inaccurate information] .
